TopicTitle: M-262A Schwalbe - With four primitive rockets

Articles.Content:
That's right. This Me-262A is armed with four primitive liquid fueled rockets developed in Peenemunde by Wherner Von Braun.

It cruises at 348 m/s at sea level when clean. The maneuverability is excellent for an interceptor with 20 G quick turns, it carries over 1,000 units of liquid fuel, It has an unobstructed cockpit canopy and it has very durable landing gear.

It's a nice jet:

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/7hupmg53qj3wt46/Me-262A.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/7hupmg53qj3wt46/Me-262A.craft?dl=0)
